DEMO_805_MSG_010:
̂I feel as though this goes without saying... but the Gods of Creation possess unfathomable amounts of power.
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_020: ̂If you go in there with the same approach you've always used, you will get absolutely destroyed in battle against them.
DEMO_805_MSG_030:
̂However... I've come up with a plan for you. There are specific accessories that will give you the upper hand against them.
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_050:
̂Each ring is specifically named after the God of Creation that you should use it against... !
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_060:
̂These rings, however... they are not simply found laying
around our world, unlike most other items.
DEMO_805_MSG_070:
̂By now, you've likely familiarized yourself with this Disc
Machine, right? It links you to virtual worlds.
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_080:
̂I want you to first visit their worlds using the respective
discs, to train against them virtually!
DEMO_805_MSG_090:
̂You don't have those specific discs, you say?
Like I said, I'm already one step ahead of you.
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_100:
̂We're simply going to use this machine to create
these discs we're after!
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_103: ̂At the moment, this feature has been disabled. However, after a few key strokes, like so... !
DEMO_805_MSG_106:
̂It's been unlocked, just like that! You can now use the
Disc Creation feature whenever you like!
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_110:
̂The machine already knows about these discs. However, to gain access to recreate them... you'll need the correct passwords!
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_120: ̂Each password consists of a combination of specific keywords. Each Disc World's code is also unique and descriptive.
DEMO_805_MSG_130: ̂For example... try entering God of Land into the machine, and then have it create that disc.
DEMO_805_MSG_140: Received the God of Land code and 32000Ｇ!
DEMO_805_MSG_150:
̂I gave you that gold because the machine requires
energy, which you can create by converting gold.
ā
DEMO_805_MSG_160: ̂Once you've created the disc, come back and let me see it. I'd like to make sure there were no errors.
